data.title: The Beer Connoisseur on LinkedIn: #beer #craftbeer #brewery #breweries #brewing #beerconnoisseur…
data.meta_description:
Spoetzl Brewery Launches Nationwide Rollout of Revamped Shiner Bock Cans

Discover the revamped Shiner Bock cans from Spoetzl Brewery! Embrace Texas tradition…
data.text:
Why are so many craft breweries closing all of a sudden? Owners will tell you they haven't recovered from COVID, while jaded fans are blaming style trends that go against tradition, or their own preferences. Hyperbole around “bad beer” is often cited as well, but none of these are the crux of the problem. When the new wave of breweries began coming online around 2010, a "Hype Cycle" began that caused the perceived financial opportunity in craft beer to inflate to illogical heights. The key to navigating these cycles successfully begins with self-awareness and an accompanying business plan that recognizes the fact that you’re in one. More on today's blog post: https://lnkd.in/gYWkCDNr #beer #craftbeer #hardseltzer #hypecycle

Two of the Midwest's most beloved Summer Wheat Beers are using their brand's strength to bridge outside of the beer style they became known for in an effort to create their newest variety packs. I react to these strategic moves in this week's post: https://lnkd.in/gB3cvefV #beer #craftbeer #beerindustry
